SEARCH
Package database

Class DBManager

java.lang.Object
database.DBManager
public class DBManager extends Object
DBManager class provides functionalities to interact with the database using JDBC. It allows operations like displaying recipients, inserting a new recipient, and deleting a recipient based on the award ID.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DBManager()
    Constructs a new DBManager instance by establishing a database connection using properties from a file.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    deleteRecipient(int awardID)
    Deletes a recipient from the Recipients table in the database based on a specified award ID.
    void
    displayRecipients()
    Displays all the recipients from the Recipients table in the database along with their attributes.
    void
    insertRecipient(String name, int year, String city, String category)
    Inserts a new recipient into the Recipients table in the database.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • DBManager

      public DBManager()
      Constructs a new DBManager instance by establishing a database connection using properties from a file.

  • Method Details

    • displayRecipients

      public void displayRecipients()
      Displays all the recipients from the Recipients table in the database along with their attributes.

    • insertRecipient

      public void insertRecipient(String name, int year, String city, String category)
      Inserts a new recipient into the Recipients table in the database.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the recipient.
      year - The year when the award was given.
      city - The city of the recipient.
      category - The category of the award.

    • deleteRecipient

      public void deleteRecipient(int awardID)
      Deletes a recipient from the Recipients table in the database based on a specified award ID.
      Parameters:
      awardID - The unique identifier for the award/recipient.
